articles.content: Kobach says Kansas’s debate over public education funding has focused too heavily on the amount of funding, rather than where taxpayer funds are being spent. Under Kobach’s education plan, it will be mandatory for 75 percent of the state’s education budget to… [+1035 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Morris
articles.title: Poll: Republican McSally Takes Commanding 7-Point Lead Over Democrat Sinema in Arizona
articles.description: A new poll from OH Predictive Insights and ABC15 Arizona (ABC15/OHPI) shows Republican Martha McSally steadily leading Democrat Kyrsten Sinema in the Arizona United States Senate race.
articles.content: McSally currently holds a seven point lead over Sinema, 52 percent to Sinema’s 45 percent. Two percent are still undecided and one percent support Green candidate Angela Green. The poll, conducted via phone from October 22-23, also found Sinema to be unfavora… [+1393 chars]

articles.author: Michelle Moons, Michelle Moons
articles.title: Trump in Florida: Far-Left Media Used Tragedy of Synagogue Attack to ‘Sow Anger and Division’
articles.description: President Donald Trump at Wednesday’s rally in Florida called out far left media for using his trip to pay respects to Pittsburgh synagogue shooting victims to “sow anger and division.”
articles.content: The president on Tuesday visited victims, survivors, hospital staff, and the memorial to the victims of the mass shooting that occurred days ago at the Tree of Life Synagogue in Pittsburgh. He expressed grief for families of the fallen and gratitude for law e… [+2499 chars]

articles.author: Katherine Rodriguez, Katherine Rodriguez
articles.title: Mayor Bill de Blasio Forgets to Honor NYC Terror Attack Victims at Memorial
articles.description: Democrat New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio had to apologize to the loved ones of victims killed in a terror attack near New York City's Tribeca neighborhood in 2017 because he forgot to pay homage to the victims of the attack.
articles.content: Survivors of the attack and relatives of those killed attended the ceremony, but Bill de Blasio failed to mention the victims by name or give any information about who they were. Instead, the mayor thanked first responders without mentioning anything about th… [+1221 chars]

articles.author: Edwin Mora
articles.title: U.S. Court Convicts American Trying to Join Islamic State via Mexico
articles.description: An American federal court convicted a Wisconsin man of trying to provide support to the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS), the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) announced this week.
articles.content: On Oct. 5, 2016, Ludke and his coconspirator were traveling to the Texas/Mexico border in order to accomplish their plan to join ISIS (in Syria or Iraq), when law enforcement located and arrested them, DOJ revealed on Tuesday. The Trump administration identif… [+1965 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Caplan
articles.title: Barack and Michelle Obama Plan to Adapt Anti-Trump Book for Netflix Series
articles.description: Former President Barack Obama and former First Lady Michelle Obama plan to adapt Michael Lewis' book 'The Fifth Risk' into a Netflix series.
articles.content: The Fifth Risk, slated for release on October 2 via W.W. Norton, details the so-called “chaos and mismanagement” that occurred inside the Departments of Agriculture, Commerce, and Energy during the transition period between Obama and then-president-elect Dona… [+1574 chars]

articles.author: Edwin Mora
articles.title: Taliban Claims Shooting Down Afghan Chopper near Iran, Killing 25
articles.description: The Taliban reportedly claimed to be behind Wednesday’s crash of an Afghan army helicopter near Afghanistan’s border with Iran that killed all 25 people on board, including senior officials.
articles.content: Wednesdays deadly incident comes days after U.S. President Donald Trumps administration imposed sanctions on the Afghan Taliban and its Iranian backers. The U.S. military has asserted that Iran is lending support to the Taliban, an accusation that Tehran deni… [+2037 chars]
